PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-06552019-06-02,  ,  INFC,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities of HENRI-JEAN BONNIS of Mount Royal, Quebec, to be a director of the board of directors of The Jacques-Cartier and Champlain Bridges Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 18, 2019, in the place of Dominique Bouchard, whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
